Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.32231345]Virus:SARS-CoV-2,SARS-CoV,MERS-CoV,HCoV-OC43,HCoV-229E,HCoV-NL63,CoV-WIV1,CoV-Rs3367,CoV-SHC014(No inhibition on the concentration up to 10 ÂµM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide acted as a fusion inhibitor which against SARS-CoV-2 S protein-mediated membrane fusion and pseudovirus infection.

Literature.Title: Inhibition of SARS-CoV-2 (previously 2019-nCoV) infection by a highly potent pan-coronavirus fusion inhibitor targeting its spike protein that harbors a high capacity to mediate membrane fusion.
Literature.Author: Xia S, Liu M, Wang C, Xu W, Lan Q, Feng S, Qi F, Bao L, Du L, Liu S, Qin C, Sun F, Shi Z, Zhu Y, Jiang S, Lu L.
